mysVhxn1tlyBGjW_w.name: Modifier
mysVhxn1tlyBGjW_w.notes: Must enter "the Stalking" once every 20 days.

mFZE4LWMZLc0WgiGL.name: Directional
mFZE4LWMZLc0WgiGL.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

mxypIBt-fk2z9V8fl.name: Tough Skin
mxypIBt-fk2z9V8fl.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

mXtOzV00lLvxc2jKR.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

tB3LismYoJRTC1p2C.name: Temperature Tolerance
tB3LismYoJRTC1p2C.notes:
"Comfort zone" is 35-124"F heat. The Drakarans evolved in desert lands: the function of their colorful scales is not so
much armor as to reflect heat and retain moisture. They prefer warm dry conditions that approximate the anceslral steppes of their homeworld.

t7HeaHzmdhZRhJ73j.name: Quirk - Unfazeable
t7HeaHzmdhZRhJ73j.notes: Drakarans rarely display emotion, and are not prone to panic (+1 to avoid Fright Checks)

tD7prbwydDElqi76v.name: Hard of Hearing
tD7prbwydDElqi76v.notes: -2 on any skill roll where it is important that you understand someone who is talking

tVvZJTfhGMnVjQJ4E.name: No Depth Perception
tVvZJTfhGMnVjQJ4E.notes: Instead of suffering the more severe penalties of One Eye. Their large eye gives a -2 when firing Snap Shots (or on Vision rolls to judge distances if the Drak docs not take a second to concentrate). There is no penalty when making Aimed attacks or in melee.

t-bnuqtUjfIspzR_j.name: Truthfulness
t-bnuqtUjfIspzR_j.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you must keep silent about an uncomfortable truth (lying by omission). Roll at -5 if you actually have to tell a falsehood! If you fail, you blurt out the truth, or stumble so much that your lie is obvious.
